member.name: P:Whetstone.Alexa.EmailChecker.RequestRecordMessage.SessionId
member.summary: This is the session id related to the connecting service.
member.remarks: If this connecting app is Alexa, then this is the Alexa session id.

member.name: P:Whetstone.Alexa.EmailChecker.RequestRecordMessage.UserId
member.summary: The user id provided by the connecting service. It is possible the user id is missing if request is a CanFulfill request.
member.remarks: If the connected service is Alexa, then this is the Alexa user id.
